Articles.Content: I think it would be nice to see a snap shot from the launch pad of saved ships that we have built, instead of the little green default ship

Do you imagine the game itself picks a camera position from which to generate the snapshot or do you imagine the user picking the camera position for the craft's "ID image"?

I see issues with doing it either way. Something to think about anyway.

I agree this would certainly be a nice to have. Rather than a launch pad shot, perhaps just one from the SPH/VAB to save having to render it on the launchpad. The shot could possibly be chosen by the game zoomed to get the whole craft in at a decent size.

In addition it would be nice to see a sort of stat sheet for each saved craft, showing pertinent information like weight, part count, dV etc.

Do you imagine the game itself picks a camera position from which to generate the snapshot or do you imagine the user picking the camera position for the craft's "ID image"?

I see issues with doing it either way. Something to think about anyway.

I am not a programmer but thought it would be a link from the camera's position at the time of launch, any small view would help to know which craft you are about to load. Right now I am using print screen shots saved on my desk top to remember what the craft looked like without having to load and exit each one.
